column4: BRIEF-Unitil- New Hampshire Public Utilities Commission Issued Final Order In Docket
column6: * UNITIL-ON MAY 2,NEW HAMPSHIRE PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION ISSUED FINAL ORDER IN DOCKET NO. DG 17-070, DISTRIBUTION BASE RATE CASE FILED ON JUNE 5,2017
column7: * UNITIL SAYS ORDER APPROVES SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT BETWEEN NEW HAMPSHIRE DIVISION OF NORTHERN UTILITIES INC,NHPUC STAFF & OFFICE OF CONSUMER ADVOCATE Source text: (bit.ly/2rqQHO7) Further company coverage:

column7: * NATURAL GAS SALES MARGIN WAS $39.9 MILLION IN THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018, AN INCREASE OF $1.9 MILLION COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2017
